text: Danilovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Gaynskoye Rural Settlement, Gaynsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 222 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 4 km south from Gayny. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gaynsky District
title: Danilovo, Perm Krai
